definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: The shadow intermingled with the sunshine.
Photo Gallery: Sydney Bondi Beach Sunbathing is a popular way to relax in Sydney.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼的日光浴是一個受歡迎的途徑有利於鬆弛。

sentences.english: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days; and caused the dayspring to know his place;
sentences.chinese: 你自生以來，曾命定晨光，使清晨的日光知道本位。

sentences.english: Tanning beds can also produce high levels of U-V radiation.
sentences.chinese: 日光浴也會產生高強度的紫外線。

sentences.english: The plant is leafing out in the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 這株植物在夏日的日光中長葉子。

sentences.english: Then June came , Sun shine , are we still nowhere ?
sentences.chinese: 夏來，日光照耀，一切還是無法結束嗎？

sentences.english: Nikko and the Okunikko area around Lake Chuzenji, in particular, are well known for their beautiful autumn colors (koyo).
sentences.chinese: 日光地區湯元及中禪寺湖的紅葉特別著名。

sentences.english: Discharging of the targeted fluorescent detection.
sentences.chinese: 出料段配置日光燈檢測。

sentences.english: Sunlight Rock and western-style houses hidden in the lush greenery on Gulangyu Islet, a tiny island off the coast of Xiamen, were faintly visible.
sentences.chinese: 陽光下的鼓浪嶼，日光巖和綠林掩映的洋房依稀可見。

sentences.english: I have seen all the works that are done under the sun; and, behold, all is vanity and vexation of spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我見日光之下所作的一切事，都是虛空，都是捕風。

sentences.english: In the daylight I examined her perfect body inch by inch.
sentences.chinese: 日光下，我一寸一寸地打量着她那完美的胴體。

sentences.english: Why is oil visible in sunglint?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼可以在日光返輝中看到油污？

sentences.english: Hand-woven straw hats take a sunbath under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 手工編織的草帽，在屋前排好隊，進行日光浴。

sentences.english: He wanted to sunbathe rather than swim.
sentences.chinese: 他寧願曬日光浴也不去游泳。

sentences.english: Who can tell him what will happen under the sun after he is gone?
sentences.chinese: 誰能告訴他身後在日光之下有什麼事呢？

sentences.english: Come, Thou Dayspring, come and cheer our spirits by Thine advent here.
sentences.chinese: 來吧，你這清晨的日光，以你的降臨鼓舞我們的心靈。

definition: to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
(of the sunlight) to bathe all things/to shine gloriously
